Progress tracker is a time management and self developement application
Initially user have 20 WP (in-app currency, stands for will power) and activities section unlocked.
In Activities section user is able to choose any activity if any slots left
If user is out of slots, zone upgrade has to be bought
Any current activity can be upgraded to get more WP. Requirements for activity also raised
Once per day user can submit finished activities to get WP
To submit properly set amount of portions made for each activity and press 'End day' button
To refresh current run press 'Restart map' button
On gaining WP user also gets the same amount of XP
When certain amount of XP gained user level rises thus making new features available
